TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void AnonymousIdentificationEventHandler(object sender, AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed AnonymousIdentificationEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub AnonymousIdentificationEventHandler(sender As Object, e As AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs)
public delegate void AnonymousIdentificationEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs ^ e);
type AnonymousIdentificationEventHandler = delegate of obj * AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs -> unit

Docs.summary: 表示处理 的 **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** 事件的方法。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventHandler>用于定义委托<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>事件的<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>类。 您可以访问<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>的事件<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>类通过指定一个名为子例程**AnonymousIdentification_Creating** ASP.NET 应用程序的 Global.asax 文件中。 <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>期间引发事件<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.PostAuthenticateRequest>事件。
<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>构造<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs>对象使用当前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>并将其传递给**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件。
可以使用<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>的属性<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs>对象提供给**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件以便设置为自定义值的匿名标识符。 如果未指定的值<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>属性期间**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件，<xref:System.Guid>使用。
**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**匿名标识时，才引发事件<xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A>通过将配置元素设置为`true`。
## Examples 下面的代码示例使用**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件以便设置为自定义值的匿名标识符。
[!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule/CS/global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule/VB/global.asax#1)]
